description.value: Scoring a critical hit with a weapon with the disentanglement fusion alters the target at a subatomic level, causing debilitating and horrific mutations. The weapon gains the @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj]{Mutation} critical hit effect. If the weapon already has a critical hit effect, when you score a critical hit, you can apply either the weapon’s normal critical hit effect or the @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj]{Mutation} effect.
